Package com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv

Contains data validation and data encoding framework classes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISCDataValidationAware
    This interface defined methods which should be implemented by any class which is data validation aware.
    ISCEncoder  
    ISCRuleRegistry
    This interface defines methods which should be implemented by any rule registry.
    ISCValidationRule
    Defines methods which all validation rules need to implement.
    ISCValidationRuleKey
    This interface defines a key for which validation rules can be registered.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCBaseValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>
    Useful implementation of ISCValidationRule.
    SCByPassValidationRule
    This is the validation rule for the open form fields which are to be canonicalized and sent back to check for any intrusions
    SCCodecsManager
    This class keeps instances of various codecs and provides access to them.
    SCDefaultRuleRegistry
    This class provides default implementation of ISCRuleRegistry.
    SCDVLoggerHelper
    This helper class provides some of the utility methods which are needed for logging data validation events.
    SCDVUtils
    This class contains utility methods.
    SCEncoder
    This class provides various functions to encode or decode an input based on for various use cases.
    SCJavaValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>
    An abstract implementation of ISCValidationRule which makes sure that any validation includes intrusion check.
    SCRegexValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>
    This class provides an implementation of ISCValidationRule which validates an input based on defined black-list and white-list regular expressions.
    SCStringValidationRule<T extends SCValidationContext>
    This is an adapter validation class which internally uses ESAPI StringValidation rule.
    SCValidationContext
    This class provides contextual information involving data validation.
    SCValidationErrorList
    Class provides a container for validation errors.
    SCValidator
    This is the class which control data validation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SCEncodingException
    A encoding exception should be thrown whenever any problem is encountered during encoding/decoding a string.
    SCValidationException
    A Validation exception should be thrown whenever invalid input is encountered.

Package com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv Description

Contains data validation and data encoding framework classes
